code: import axios from"axios";import{appConstants}from"../constants/constant";export var postMaintenance=function postMaintenance(eu,success,failure){var postMaintenancePromise=axios.post("".concat(appConstants.API,"/maintenances"),eu).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.MAINTENANCE,payload:postMaintenancePromise};};export var putMaintenance=function putMaintenance(maintenance){var putMaintenancePromise=axios.put("".concat(appConstants.API,"/maintenances"),maintenance);return{type:appConstants.PUT_MAINTENANCE,payload:putMaintenancePromise};};export var getMaintenance=function getMaintenance(){var getMaintenancePromise=axios.get("".concat(appConstants.API,"/maintenances/notFinished"),{withCredentials:true});return{type:appConstants.GET_MAINTENANCE,payload:getMaintenancePromise};};
